definition: superfluous/redundant/cumbersome/refers to a son-in-law living with wife's family
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: These negative words are called redundancy of negators in Chinese and ne explétif in French.
sentences.chinese: 這些詞被稱爲否定羨餘或否定贅詞。

sentences.english: "I was one of those speakers who used an array of filler words, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經是那些，使用一連串贅詞演講者的其中一位。

sentences.english: When Nadia Moffett became aware of her filler-word problem, she took action.
sentences.chinese: 當納迪亞莫菲特知道她有贅詞的問題，她採取了行動。
